text: "Kids" is a 1994 song by English funk band Jamiroquai. It is the sixth track from their second studio album The Return of the Space Cowboy and it was only released in Japan. It was not released as a single worldwide. ==Track listing== * Japanese CD single # "The Kids" – 4:13 # "When You Gonna Learn" (Live at Leadmill, Sheffield) – 9:51 # "When You Gonna Learn" (Digeridoo Instrumental) – 6:31 ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Jamiroquai songs
title: Kids (Jamiroquai song)
